entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:26 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:26 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Near blizzard developing in the evening. Blowing snow at times early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:26 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
